name: Crimson Survival
description: More power, more zombies and a royal battle with players from around the world. In Crimson Survival, you must survive among zombies and online players. Constantly advancing zombies and eager to stay alive players.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
